text: The Olympiastadion is a sports stadium in Berlin, Germany. It was built for the 1936 Olympic Games. == Events == * 1936 Summer Olympics * 1974 FIFA World Cup * 2006 FIFA World Cup * 2009 World Championships in Athletics * Hertha BSC Berlin(Bundesliga home Stadium) == Other websites == * Official Olympiastadion Site Category:Football stadiums in Germany Category:Buildings and structures in Berlin Category:Sport in Berlin Category:1936 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic venues
title: Olympiastadion Berlin
